snippet: With its passengers to be high-level diplomats, the police said, the double-decker from London was too vulnerable.
abstract: New York Police Department declines to approve plans to allow classic red London double-decker bus to carry delegation of British diplomats through Midtown Manhattan to United Nations, on security grounds; bus is instead confined to traffic circle in front of United Nations.
lead_paragraph: With its passengers to be high-level diplomats, the police said, the double-decker from London was too vulnerable.

headline.seo: Citing Risk, New York Police Halt Bus Ride by U.N. Diplomats
headline.main: Fill a U.N.-Bound Double-Decker With Diplomats? Citing Risk, New York’s Police Say No
headline.print_headline: Fill a U.N.-Bound Double-Decker With Diplomats? Citing Risk, New York’s Police Say No
